what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal ghedata share data resources document work Global Health Engineering group ETH Zurich. data can used research, teaching, learning purposes. data available R data package, CSV XLSX formats.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version ghedata GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table . Click Download CSV. window opens displays CSV browser. Right-click anywhere inside window select “Save Page …”. Save file folder choice.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("global-health-engineering/ghedata") ## Run the following code in console if you don't have the packages ## install.packages(c("dplyr", "knitr", "readr", "stringr", "gt", "kableExtra")) library(dplyr) library(knitr) library(readr) library(stringr) library(gt) library(kableExtra) library(ggthemes) library(ggplot2)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: package provides access one data resource.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: dataset people contains data people worked group. includes staff, well undergraduate student projects. 96 observations 7 variables. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: far, GHE supervised 81 projects 19 done BSc 62 MSc students.
code: library(ghedata)  undergrad_students <- people |>    filter(b_m_student == "yes") |>   filter(!is.na(project_id)) |>    filter(!is.na(year)) undergrad_students |>    count(year, degree) |>    ggplot(aes(x = factor(year), y = n, label = n,               color = degree, group = degree)) +   geom_line() +   geom_label() +   labs(x = "Degree",        y = "Number of students") +   scale_color_colorblind() +   theme_minimal() +   theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),         axis.text.y = element_blank())

what: people: A registry of all people that have worked for Global Health Engineering, including undergraduate student projects. — people
title: people: A registry of all people that have worked for Global Health Engineering, including undergraduate student projects. — people
people: A registry of all people that have worked for Global Health Engineering, including undergraduate student projects. — people
people: A registry of all people that have worked for Global Health Engineering, including undergraduate student projects. — people
text: tibble 96 rows 7 variables project_id Unique identifier person using combination metadata. Folder name Google Drive. degree Categorical variable four levels: bsc, msc, phd, staff. type Categorical variable six levels: hiwi, intern, post-doc, scientific-assitant, sem-proj, thesis. b_m_student Binary variable identify person BSc MSc students. Levels: yes, . start_date Start date person. year Year start date. thesis_title Title thesis.
